description: ImÍnfo was a small company providing IT services and taining. I worked as developer on java projects and occasionally as trainer.

Projects.description: An eclipse RCP application for Faiveley Transport

description: Sopra Steria is a french IT company. I worked as developer and technical leader for various clients (Ministry of the Interior, Pôle Emploi, ERDF).

Projects.title: MIOMCT (ACTES, ELOI, AGRIPPA, FNEAG)
Projects.client: Ministère de l'Intérieur (French Ministry of the Interior)
Projects.description: As Software Engineer, I worked on the maintenance of the MIOMCT applications. I had to fix bugs and develop new features on those applications. I also had to write technical documentation and functionnal specification.

Projects.title: GUPPI
Projects.description: As Software Engineer, I worked on the maintenance of the GUPPI application. I had to fix bugs and develop new features on those applications.

Projects.title: TAMARIS
Projects.description: As Technical Leader, I worked on the maintenance of the TAMARIS application. I had to fix bugs and develop new features on those applications. I also had to write technical documentation and functionnal specification.

description: Infotel is a french IT company. I worked as developer for a client (Bureau Veritas).

Projects.description: As Frontend Software Engineer, I worked on the maintenance of the Bureau Veritas applications. I had to fix bugs and develop new features on existing applications. I had also to work on new application like Code'n'Go where I had to put in place frontend architecture and integrate UI design made by an external company.

description: Talend is a company specialised in data integration. I'm working as frontend engineer on Talend Cloud.

Projects.title: Talend Management Console (TMC)
Projects.description: As Senior Frontend Engineer, I worked on the Talend Management Console. I had to fix bugs and develop new features on those applications. Now as Principal Frontend Engineer, I'm working more on technical architecture and code quality to keep the project up to date with the standards and I continue to participate on the design of the new features.
